title: Fearless
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:19.47] There's something about the way
[00:21.95] The street looks when it's just rained
[00:25.10] There's a glow off the pavement
[00:27.19] You walk me to the car
[00:30.03] And you know I wanna ask you to dance right there
[00:34.56] In the middle of the parking lot, yeah
[00:40.34] 
[00:47.70] We're drivin' down the road, I wonder if you know
[00:53.78] I'm trying so hard not to get caught up now
[00:58.39] But you're just so cool, run your hands through your hair
[01:03.22] Absentmindedly makin' me want you
[01:07.58] And I don't know how it gets better than this
[01:13.41] You take my hand and drag me headfirst, fearless
[01:17.46] And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[01:22.95] In a storm in my best dress, fearless
[01:28.82] 
[01:35.36] So baby drive slow 'til we run out of road
[01:41.38] In this one-horse town, I wanna stay right here
[01:46.38] In this passenger seat, you put your eyes on me
[01:51.14] In this moment, now capture it, remember it
[01:55.47] 'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[02:01.48] You take my hand and drag me headfirst, fearless
[02:05.98] And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[02:10.94] In a storm in my best dress, fearless
[02:16.53] 
[02:33.33] Well, you stood there with me in the doorway
[02:39.28] My hands shake, I'm not usually this way
[02:43.46] But you pull me in and I'm a little more brave
[02:48.73] It's the first kiss, it's flawless, really somethin'
[02:55.18] It's fearless
[02:58.49] 
[03:01.43] Oh yeah
[03:05.56] 'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[03:11.31] You take my hand and drag me headfirst, fearless
[03:15.77] And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[03:20.84] In a storm in my best dress, fearless
[03:25.96] 'Cause I don't know how it gets better than this
[03:30.67] You take my hand and drag me headfirst, fearless
[03:35.21] And I don't know why but with you I'd dance
[03:40.29] In a storm in my best dress, fearless
[03:46.54] Oh, oh, oh yeah
[03:49.83]
